content: OK, So what should be my first step?

Hello! The Ministry of Education & Higher Education provides various services to students and parents. One of the services is the electronic transfer service for public schools. To use this service, you need to register on the Ministry's website and follow the steps provided. The Ministry also provides an electronic system to manage all school certificate equivalency procedures in a complete electronic manner. To use this service, you need to register on the Ministry's website and follow the steps provided. If you have any questions or need further assistance, you can contact the Ministry's Student Information Center Department.
